Sorry, it must've been mixxed up in the battle. I found it.

claw struck hi=
m, but Gigas didn't move. Beholder 2 and Grenade are both bowled over by th=
e energy ball. Horn Drill jumps in the air and backflips, happy that he aga=
in came through for the Mini-Mafia. Gigas looks down at Razorclaw. (Judging=
 by the size of the Razorclaw figure and the fact that Gigas is a large, Ul=
tra sized bot, like Depth Charge) Gigas swings a huge punch at Razorclaw

R=
azor Claws head snapped back from Gigas' punch.  The punch hurt like hell b=
ut Razor Claw wouldn't show pain. The impact caused the Raptor to be knocke=
d back about ten feet but he stayed on his feat. He looked back  at the att=
acker and couldn't hold back a snarl. "I hope that wasn't your best shot, I=
'd hate to have to eliminate you in an unfair fight".
  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, Dece=
mber 19, 2000 6:13 PM
  Subject: Re: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe =
the three should get help.


  OOC: Hey, Gigas punched at Razorclaw, post d=
amage...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nb=
wrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 10:31 AM
    Subject=
: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three should get help.


    Ra=
zor Claw saw the three bots leaving the sceen of the battle and mistook the=
m for escaping alliance members. he mentally reported his actions to Ice an=
d got the go ahead. He chased the three until they were out of the way of t=
he fight. He transformed to robot mode, pulled his sword and confronted the=
m. "You will stop or you will be forced to, your choice."

    He aproached=
 the three bots ready for battle and hoping that things won't be ended peac=
efully.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: dachande 
      To:=
 nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40 PM
      Su=
bject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramus


      ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus:=
:
       
          They had heard the battling and decided to run away, th=
ey needed no part in the conflict. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus a=
s they were leaving, and togther they exited the base, in beast modes. And =
headed far away.




        eGroups Sponsor
